'''Argauun'''
The Argauuns were a group to which the female Jedi Knight [[Talia Moonseeker]] belonged. Around 22 BBY, shortly before the outbreak of the Clone Wars, Moonseeker reached the rank of Jedi Knight after training under Jedi Master [[Va'too]]. Four months after her promotion, Moonseeker fought in the First Battle of [[Geonosis]], during which her former Master was killed, while the Argauun survived; the outcome compelled Moonseeker to hang her head in shame.
